Text.Page:
Grrr!

Tunvi just has to strut around in those new saberskin boots.

I'm not jealous or anything...oh, who am I kidding? Yes I am! Say, can you do me a favor?"What can I do?"

It's ridiculous. I know you need to defend the federation and all, but those {@LinkCreature:15#10#rabid inky sabertooths} really do have nice fur.

If I had some, I could knock Tunvi down a peg or two, which would certainly make me feel less defensive.
Beautiful! I'm going to make a pair of gloves! This is for you. Thanks.
Do you have the fur yet? Do you? Oh, I can hardly wait!
